Q_NAME: Sum of ODD or EVEN numbers
Q_DESC:
Write a MATLAB program to add all the ODD numbers or add all EVEN numbers for first n numbers based on the requirement of the customer.
Case 1: Addition of Even Numbers
Case 2: Addition of ODD numbers
If user input is 100 then Sum of even numbers is (0+2+4+6+...100 = 2550)
